name: Foodcaching
description: Great Deals, Better Food. More Fun.
overview:
What happens when a Treasure Hunt meets Geocaching? Foodcaching!

Foodcaching connects cool restaurants making real-time offers to savvy consumers. We get families and people together to find and share great deals and enjoy the food or drinks that they love.

We leverage powerful social game mechanics. Consumers earn Food Cash points. Play against the all-up leaders, or just against selected contacts, or Facebook friends.

The Foodcaching apps power Seattle based movement that allows food establishments to refocus consumer attention on quality, value, special dietary needs, and dining experience vs wild discounts.

We are all about local food business owners coming together to reach consumers and tell their story. Many top businesses leaders including the ones below are already leveraging our web and smartphone applications to power their Mobile Advertising and Social Media efforts and to make a positive change thatâ€™s good for consumers and for restaurants.

Here are the Foodcaching System Features that attracted our growing group of restaurant partners: â€¢ Compete on Quality, Dining Experience and Value vs Wild Discounts â€¢ Drive business when you have seats to fill â€“ Real-time mobile marketing â€¢ Reach new customers directly, increase return customer visits, and increase profitability â€¢ You control your mobile marketing and create your own promotions â€“ Self Service â€¢ Simple transaction process â€“ No pre-paid coupons, paper, numbers, or receipts involved â€¢ Measure results in real-time with full online analytics â€¢ Your customers will invite friends to join them at your restaurant and share positive experiences seamlessly with Facebook, Twitter, texts & email â€¢ Automatically tabulate ‘loyalty’ points for each visit and, even more points for sharing with friends
